doctor.name: Dr. Md. Amir Hossain Mia
doctor.specialty: Asthma, Allergy, Diabetes & Chest Diseases Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Amir Hossain Mia is a Chest Diseases Specialist in Comilla. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), CCD (BIRDEM), DTCD (CHEST), MACP (USA). He is a Assistant Professor, Respiratory Medicine at Cumilla Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Ibn Sina Diagnostic Center, Comilla. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Amir Hossain Mia at Ibn Sina Diagnostic Center, Comilla is 3pm to 7pm (Sat, Mon, Tue & Wed).

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Mahfuzul Haque
doctor.specialty: Chest Diseases, Asthma & Respiratory Medicine Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Mahfuzul Haque is a Chest Diseases Specialist in Comilla. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), DTCD. He is a Former Senior Consultant, Respiratory Medicine at Chest Diseases Hospital, Chittagong. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Cumilla Medical Center Pvt. Ltd. (Tower Hospital). Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Mahfuzul Haque at Cumilla Medical Center Pvt. Ltd. (Tower Hospital) is 10am to 12pm & 4pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Imam Uddin Ahmad
doctor.specialty: Chest Diseases, Asthma & Respiratory Medicine Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Imam Uddin Ahmed is a well known Chest Diseases Specialist in Cumilla. His qualification is MBBS (Dhaka Medical College), DTCD (National institute of Diseases of chest and Hospital), FCCP (USA). He is a Senior Consultant in the Department of Chest Diseases at Gomati Hospital, Cumilla. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Gomati Hospital, Cumilla, for suffering from Cough, Fever, Respiratory distress, Asthma, Respiratory tract infections, Allergic conditions and other  ailments of chest. Practicing hour of Dr. Imam Uddin Ahmed at Gomati Hospital, Cumilla is 10am to 1pm daily, Friday Closed.

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Mizanur Rahman
doctor.specialty: Chest Diseases, Asthma, TB & Respiratory Medicine Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Mizanur Rahman is a Chest Diseases Specialist in Comilla. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), DTCD (BSMMU). He is a Junior Consultant (Chest) at Chest Disease Clinic, Cumilla. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Medicomplex. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Mizanur Rahman at Medicomplex is 3pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Mahabubur Rahman
doctor.specialty: Chest Diseases (Cough, Chest Pain, TB, COPD, Allergy, Asthma) Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Mahabubur Rahman is a highly skilled chest diseases specialist in Cumilla, holding an MBBS from DMC, BCS (Health), and MD in Chest Diseases. He is a Member of the American College of Chest Physicians and currently serves as the Assistant Professor & Head of the Chest Diseases Department at Cumilla Medical College & Hospital. Dr. Mahabubur Rahman specializes in the diagnosis and treatment of various respiratory and chest-related conditions, including persistent cough, SOB chest pain, tuberculosis (TB), chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), bronchial asthma, respiratory allergies, pneumonia, pleural effusion, interstitial lung diseases, and lung infections. He provides consultation at Mukti Hospital, Cumilla (3.30pm to 8.30pm, Closed: Thursday & Friday).
